text: Need Olivia Davis for Lush campaign. Budget around $7,967, looking for 2 x Instagram post, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x 15-second TikTok. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
